entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Simplifier.ReduceAsync method does not return, waits forever #69178
  • "Implement through" isn't available for primary constructor parameters #69177
    Backlog
  • Severity configuration is confusing #69176

Closed

  • CS0052: Compilation error when trying to compile class with internal protected member which has internal type #69175
  • Primary constructor properties have sequence points but breakpoints can't be placed #63299
    17.8 P1

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary calls to `Contains` for sets #69179
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • Small simplifications in helper functions. #69171
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection literals: collection builder methods #68930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Analyze primary constructor parameter captures #69174
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce array allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.TypeParameters` and `PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers` #68978
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Fix Color Color const field initialization accessing the Color type #68283
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Cache extension methods on binder #69172
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
